
hc_theme_flat
Flat theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Base16 Insipred theme https://github.com/chriskempson/base16 and https://github.com/cttobin/ggthemr#flat

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
hc_theme_flat(...)
</code></pre> 
#### Arguments 
 

...
Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples 
```{r}
highcharts_demo() %>%
hc_add_theme(hc_theme_flat())58
hc_theme_ft
```
